description:
Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El aullido de las almas muertas. Terror de un monstruo en el campamento.
Shiryou no Sakebi? Kyoufu Camp no Kaijin
The Screaming Dead: Terror of the Camp Monster
死霊の叫び!? 恐怖キャンプの怪人
